response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly impact your life or business. Considering its exceptional qualities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
